    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadAd()
      Making request of loading ad to sdk.
      void onDestroy()
      SDK handles life cycles of components, such as memory allocation, bitmap decoding, etc..., so user needs to call this method to release resources of it in order to prevent memory leaks.
      void onPause()
      SDK handles life cycles of components, so there are services running in the background, user needs to call this method to halt services to save capacity of battery when activity is paused.
      void onResume()
      If user calls onPause() before, please calls onResume() to restore its states.

      • onPause

        public void onPause()
        SDK handles life cycles of components, so there are services running in the background, user needs to call this method to halt services to save capacity of battery when activity is paused.

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        SDK handles life cycles of components, such as memory allocation, bitmap decoding, etc..., so user needs to call this method to release resources of it in order to prevent memory leaks.
